entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:25 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
